error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1140
He read 600/40=<<600/40=15>>15 hours per week
So now he reads 15-4=<<15-4=19>>19 hours per week
She now reads 40*1.5=<<40*1.5=60>>60 pages per hour
So she reads 19*60=<<19*60=1140>>1140 pages per week
